element.name: Hospital Disposition
element.definition: The known disposition of the patient from the hospital, if admitted.
element.v3Comment:
The list of values and codes is based on and in compliance with the Medicare Claims Processing Manual Chapter 25 Completing and Processing the Form CMS-1450 Data Set, referencing the Uniform Bill - Form CMS-1450 (UB-04) and FL 17 - Patient Discharge Status.
https://www.cms.gov/regulations-and-guidance/guidance/manuals/downloads/clm104c25.pdf (see "FL 17 â€“ Patient Discharge Status")
Codes are available from Medicare contractors and the National Uniform Billing Committee (NUBC, http://www.nubc.org/) via the NUBC's Official UB-04 Data Specifications Manual.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged to home or self care (routine discharge)

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to another short term general hospital for inpatient care

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to a skilled nursing facility (SNF)

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to an intermediate care facility (ICF)

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to another type of institution not defined elsewhere in this code list

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to home under care of organized home health service organization in anticipation of covered skills care

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Left against medical advice or discontinued care

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Deceased/Expired (or did not recover - Religious Non Medical Health Care Patient)

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to court/law enforcement

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Still a patient or expected to return for outpatient services.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to a Federal Health Care Facility (e.g., VA or federal health care facility)

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to Hospice - home.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to Hospice - medical facility

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred within this institution to a hospital based Medicare approved swing bed.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to a inpatient rehabilitation facility including distinct part units of a hospital.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to long term care hospitals

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to a nursing facility certified under Medicaid but not certified under Medicare

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to a psychiatric hospital or psychiatric distinct part unit of a hospital.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to a Critical Access Hospital (CAH).

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Discharged/transferred to another type of health care institution not defined elsewhere in the code list.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Not Applicable

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Not Recorded

asserts.assert: When Hospital Disposition has a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting), it should be empty.

When Hospital Disposition is empty, it should have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting, if allowed for the element) or a Pertinent Negative (if allowed for the element), or it should be omitted (if the element is optional).
